target.name: lifecycle-usage
target.echo:
XP framework module build lifecycle ------------------------------------
The following (public) targets exist for being called:
> clean Clean up workspace and removes all build leftovers
> usage Print usage & help information
> validate Validate the project setup
> prepare Perform pre-compile tasks
> compile Compile sources
> test Run unittests
> integration-test Run integration tests
> package Wrap sources into distributable package
> verify Verify packaging
> install Install package into local repository
> deploy Install package into shared / public repository
